column4: This is ridiculous, the fucking Ubuntu system fully crashed and 2 full hours of cancer cell lines research wasted because the fucking X server crashed (and NO, I'm not running shit like compiz). The system worked perfectly before, and just stopped working properly. Thanks a lot Ubuntu developers for making this piece of shit called a Linux distro.
I am uninstalling this shit immediately.
It has worse stability than Windows.
blame ubuntu cause ur hardware is faulty
